configuration:
gateway.port {{ knox.gateway_port }} The HTTP port for the Gateway.
gateway.path {{ knox.gateway_path }} The default context path for the gateway.
gateway.gateway.conf.dir deployments The directory within GATEWAY_HOME that contains gateway topology files and deployments.
gateway.hadoop.kerberos.secured {%- if hadoop.secure_mode %} true {%- else %} false {%- endif %} Boolean flag indicating whether the Hadoop cluster protected by Gateway is secured with Kerberos
java.security.krb5.conf /etc/krb5.conf Absolute path to krb5.conf file
java.security.auth.login.config /etc/knox/conf/krb5JAASLogin.conf Absolute path to JAAS login config file
sun.security.krb5.debug true Boolean flag indicating whether to enable debug messages for krb5 authentication
gateway.websocket.feature.enabled false Enable/Disable websocket feature.
gateway.scope.cookies.feature.enabled false Enable/Disable cookie scoping feature.
gateway.cluster.config.monitor.ambari.enabled false Enable/disable Ambari cluster configuration monitoring.
gateway.cluster.config.monitor.ambari.interval 60 The interval (in seconds) for polling Ambari for cluster configuration changes.
{%- for name, subdict in dyn_cfg.items() %}
{{ name }} {%- for k,v in subdict.items() %} <{{k}}>{{ v }}</{{k}}> {%- endfor %}
{%- endfor %}
